testHelp

Class GenericExceptionAssertion<T extends Throwable>

  • Object
    • GenericObjectAssertionBase<T,GenericObjectAssertion<T>>
      • GenericExceptionAssertion<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the object to examine

    public class GenericExceptionAssertion<T extends Throwable>
extends GenericObjectAssertionBase<T,GenericObjectAssertion<T>>
    Generic exception assertion class. Type may be either Exception or Error.

    To use this class to examine an exception object of unknown or possibly incorrect type, cast the subject constructor argument to Throwable.

    Note: this class is a genericized version of CallableAssertion.

    Author:
    John Armstrong

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenericExceptionAssertion

        public GenericExceptionAssertion(T subject,
                                 String... subjectDescArg)
        Constructs a new ExceptionAssertion. This is exposed so that consumers of the testHelp library can add their own assertion classes that are subclasses of ExceptionAssertion.
        Parameters:
        subject - the exception (throwable) object assertions are focused on
        subjectDescArg - an optional description of the object

    • Method Detail

      • getDftDesc

        String getDftDesc()
        Specified by:

      • withMessage

        public GenericExceptionAssertion<T> withMessage(String expected,
                                                CompareType compareType)
        Verifies that an exception has the specified message (copied from ExceptionAssertion)
        Parameters:
        expected - the expected message
        compareType - how to do the comparison (substring, case-insensitive, etc.)
        Returns:
        this if message in exception object matches expected
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if message in exception object does not match expected
